title: Interpretation of seeing verses in a dream about a married and pregnant woman

preview.html: I like it FansSubscribed Fans Interpretation of seeing worms in a dream for a married and pregnant woman. Worms usually carry different interpretations and messages in a dream that vary depending on where the worms are located, as well as the different circumstances of the sleeping person. Interpretation of seeing worms in a dream Worms may come from different places, such as coming out of a place or person, or It may be white or discolored. For more information about the interpretation of seeing worms in a dream, follow the future interpretations. Interpretation of seeing verses in a dream about a married woman. If a married woman sees worms and she is like that, from her hair, or there is in his hair in the interpretation of the verses here, goodness and blessings that could be children or money. If a married woman sees worms in the house, this means that there are major problems in the house. It may indicate the presence of envious people in the house or people who feel jealous of the house and its people. Interpretation of seeing verses in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Whoever sees that worms are eating from his body, the interpretation of the dream is often that his children are eating lots and lots of his money. But if the sleeper sees many worms in his clothes This is a sign of goodness, livelihood, and blessing. Interpretation of a dream about worms coming out of the body: Whoever sees a worm coming out of his hand, it is possible that the sleeper is eating illegal money or obtaining forbidden or illegal money. But if you dreamed of sleeping, with worms coming out of the anus. Interpretation of the sleeper’s dream about giving birth And God knows best. But if worms come out of the mouth, it is likely that the sleeper was involved in slander and gossip. Interpretation of a dream about black worms in a dream Black worms usually carry warnings such as deception, deception, or in general about the presence of envious people in one’s life. Black worms are a strong signal that a prank is coming. Interpretation of seeing worms in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees white worms in a dream, the pregnant woman will most likely give birth to a girl, and if she sees black worms, the child will be a boy, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing an empty verse in a dream is bad. Fortunately, a blank verse in a dream usually indicates that the sleeper is exposed to corruption or that he takes a bribe, for example, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing verses in a dream about a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees a white verse, the interpretation of the dream means that there is a good-hearted groom with good morals. It is benign, but if she sees the black sign, then the groom has many corrupt morals. Worms have different interpretations in the sleeper’s dream, whether she is married, a pregnant woman, or a single woman. We also explained to you the interpretation of seeing worms coming out of the mouth, stomach, hand, or body in general, and God Almighty knows best. .

title: The 50 most important interpretations of a dream about a new bag by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: New interpretations of a dream about a bag: The bag is one of the important things in life that many rely on to store special tools, and among the people who are most passionate about it are women because it coordinates the clothes on it. The bag has many colors and shapes and differs from one another in material terms, and when the dreamer sees in her dream it is a new bag. She is happy with this vision and tries to learn its interpretation, and here we learn together about the most important things that commentators said about this vision. Interpretation of a dream about a new bag. Jurists say that a bag is one of the tools that has many purposes, and its types are different, and its connotations and interpretations differ among them, and the following becomes clear: If a girl sees If an unmarried woman sees that she is carrying a new school bag, this indicates that she is dedicated to everything related to her religion, and that she has a good reputation and good morals. If the dreamer sees that she is buying a new bag, this means that she cares a lot about her affairs and loves helping others. And if the fortuneteller sees that she is carrying a bag New green color in her dream, this means that she will obtain many things that she aspired to. If an unmarried young man sees that he is buying a bag to give to the girl he loves, this promises him a close marriage with her. And if a man sees in his dream that he is carrying a new bag, this means that he He will receive a lot of profits and gains, and it may be a promotion in his job. A pregnant woman who sees in her dream a bag for a child at the time of purchasing it indicates that the time of birth is approaching and she must prepare for that. The Asrar website for the interpretation of dreams is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write. A site about secrets Interpretation of dreams: Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a new bag by Ibn Sirin. The respected scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing a new bag in the sky with many papers means that the dreamer is organized in his life and always plans to reach his goal. If a girl sees in her dream that she is carrying a new bag, This foretells that she will achieve all the ambitions that she has always dreamed of. When a woman sees that she is carrying a bag containing some prohibited items, this indicates that she will suffer from many crises and problems in her life. Ibn Sirin believes that dreaming of a bag in a dream indicates that the dreamer has many secrets and hidden things. About those close to him. A man who sees a bag in a dream also expresses his appreciation for privacy in his life and should not interfere in the lives of others. Interpretation of a dream about a new bag for a married woman. Scientists say that a married woman saw a new bag in her dream, and it was white, which means that she was close to visiting The Holy House of God, and she will be blessed with Umrah. And if the dreamer sees that she is buying a bag for children, this means that she will have good offspring and will give birth soon. When a woman sees that she is buying a new black bag, this portends her progress in her work and the acquisition of a new position to which she aspired. The respected scholar Ibn Sirin believes Seeing a married woman in a new multi-colored bag in a dream means that she will bring about many positive changes and developments in the period

title: Interpretation of seeing a large villa in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a large villa in a dream for a married woman who lives in a spacious, large, and beautiful place is one of the dreams that many people want to achieve, and the desire to achieve this dream increases with the increase in the number of elderly family members. It is beautiful, and the many details that a person can see are important in determining the interpretation. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of a dream about a large villa in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a villa in a dream for a single girl When the dreamer sees a villa or palace in a dream, and she is an unmarried girl, this may indicate that the dreamer expects a big surprise in Her life. It may also indicate that the dreamer will marry a rich man. When the dreamer sees a villa or palace in a dream, which is an unmarried girl, this may indicate that the dreamer will marry a famous man. It may also indicate that the dreamer will get married this year. • When you see the dreamer sleeping in a villa or palace in a dream and she is an unmarried girl, this may indicate that the dreamer will enjoy her life like royalty. Also, when the dreamer sees the villa or the presidential or royal palace in a dream and she is an unmarried girl, this may indicate that the dreamer will obtain a prestigious job. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a villa or palace in a dream for a married woman When the dreamer sees the villa or palace in a dream She is married, this may indicate that the dreamer will live a happy life. It can also indicate that the dreamer will fulfill all her desires. • When the dreamer sees a villa or palace in a dream while she is married, this may indicate that the dreamer will live a stable life. It may also indicate that the dreamer will become pregnant soon. When the dreamer sees the villa or palace in a dream while she is married, this may indicate that the dreamer will pay off her debts. Also, when the dreamer sees the villa or palace in a dream during marriage, this may indicate that the dreamer will remove her worries and sorrows. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a villa or palace in a dream for a pregnant woman When the dreamer sees the villa or palace in a dream during pregnancy, it may indicate This means that the dreamer will live a happy life. Also, when the dreamer sees the villa or palace in a dream during pregnancy, this may indicate that the dreamer will remove her problems and worries. When the dreamer sees the villa or palace in a dream during pregnancy, this may indicate that the dreamer will have a bright future. It may also indicate that the dreamer will have a male child. When the dreamer sees a villa or palace in a dream during pregnancy, this may indicate that the dreamer will live a stable life. It can also indicate that the dreamer will achieve goodness in her life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a villa or palace in a dream for a man: When the dreamer sees a villa or palace in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will obtain a high position, prestige, and honor if the palace is his. . Also, when the dreamer sees a villa or palace in a dream, he has lost

title: Interpretation of a dream about success by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansInterpretation of success in a dream by Ibn SirinA person always seeks success, whether in study or work, and success in a dream has many interpretations and connotations.Interpretation of a dream about success by Ibn SirinSeeing success in a dream can be a sign of goodness and blessings occurring in the dreamer’s life.Success can be Evidence of the elimination of diseases from which God suffers. Success in a dream indicates success and prosperity in trade and abundant profits from it. Seeing success in an exam while dreaming of God’s exam can mean for the dreamer. Success in a dream is an indication of achieving goals and realizing ambitions. Seeing success and obtaining A certificate in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will enter a new happy life. Success in a dream can be a sign of a journey and the achievement of goals. Seeing a black test paper in a dream is a sign of distress and bad events. Interpretation of a dream of success for singles. Seeing success in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of Achieving goals and satisfying desire. Only a girl’s dream comes true. You have evidence of marriage or dating soon. Success and excellence in a dream indicates a new job for a girl. If a girl sees in a dream that she is receiving a certificate of completion, she will be engaged to a handsome young man. Interpretation of a dream of success for a married woman. Success in a dream for a married woman Evidence of stability in married life. Success in a married woman’s dream also indicates the superiority and well-being of her husband’s children. A married woman’s obtaining a certificate of achievement in a dream is evidence of her husband’s approval of her. Seeing a successful married woman in a dream is an indication of pregnancy in the near future. Interpretation A man’s dream of successSuccess in a man’s dream can indicate activity, success in his work, and benefiting from it. Success in a man’s dream can be an indication of travel. If a man sees the dream, obtaining a certificate of achievement with an excellent grade indicates that you are in a high position at work. Seeing a young man fulfilling his dream Evidence of achieving goals and ambitions. If a young man comes in a dream with a certificate of achievement, this is good news about his commitment in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about success for a pregnant womanSuccess in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of comfort and freedom from problems and worries. Success in a pregnant woman’s dream can be a transition from Pregnancy to birth and it will be available. Success and excellence in a dream is evidence of an easy and easy birth. Interpretation of a dream of success in baccalaureate examsThe dream of baccalaureate success is considered one of the dreams that all students must interpret. The dream of obtaining a baccalaureate degree for an unmarried girl is evidence of the satisfaction that God will give that girl. The dreamer must maintain and nurture his passion and goals. The dream also shows success in graduation for the single girl, her success in life, and getting rid of all the problems she suffers from. The dream of obtaining an academic degree for any dreamer is generally taken as evidence of the dreamer’s success in life and that a better future awaits him. It is considered a dream of a person GraduateIt is a bachelor's dream, a dream that gives this ambitious dreamer F

title: Interpretation of a dream about snow: Seeing you eating snow in a dream

preview.html: SnowSnow in a dream for a single womanSnow in a dream for a pregnant womanSnow in a dream for a married womanInterpretation of snow in a dream by Imam al-SadiqInterpretation of a dream about walking in the snow in summerPlaying in the snow in a dreamFalling from the sky or seeing it on the ground shows what is between good and evil people, according to her status, condition, and abundance, and you are repelling affliction and intrigue. And the envy of people. As for the evils of its interpretation, it shows diseases caused by extreme cold, and the greater the amount of snow in connotations of evil, the greater the severity of the disease, and the greater the risk of human injury, and it is said that it shows. Obstacles to travel for those who plan to do so, and this translates into the death of some blessings for those who move away from their religion, or intentional disobedience, then he sees it in his dream, and if there is a country that has an unjust ruler, it indicates that the ruler will torture the people and collect their money in different ways and spread his alienation and injustice among his people. Interpretation of snow falling from the sky: If a person sees snow falling on him, he will travel to distant lands where it will be beneficial if the snow is light falling on him, but as for the severity of the snow falling on him, he will face damage and misfortunes on his journey. In those distant lands, whoever sleeps on the snow brings torment, illness, and turmoil. Snow fell on him suddenly in his dream or in a heavy way, because he has an enemy hiding inside him, and his enemy will reach him, and perhaps snow falling on the dreamer’s head directly indicates illness, injury, or a major wound. Whoever sees in his dream that snow is falling on dry, barren, or unsuitable land. To cultivate, or devoid of everything, such as courtyards, this indicates the goodness and mercy that will befall the dreamer and protect him from the temptations and machinations of men. Power and positions, as explained by the rain. As for seeing snow penetrating the entire country, this indicates evil, and it is said that they will be punished by God, or an unjust tyrant will rule over them, or a tormenting tribulation for the people. They fight with each other and fight. If snow showers move from one place to another in their fall, this indicates war because it is like an army moving here and there, or the spread of mobile infectious diseases, or the spread of locusts that destroy everything that is green for life. Interpretation of cases of years of snowfall Snow is known when it falls in winter, If it is summer or fall or in a season when snow does not fall, or the dreamer finds that he is in a strange situation in the dream because the snow fell because it is not at the right time, then it indicates harm and harm as well as temptation and sin or an unjust ruler who is unjust and deals, or people Those you know are trying to betray you by sitting in your place at work, stalking you, or luring you into something. As for white snow falling from the sky at the appointed time and making the beholder happy with it, or landing on land prepared for cultivation in the winter, this is good, a blessing and strength, and it contains fertility and comfort. The dreamer, whether it covers dwellings, trees, ordinary people, poor homes or the general country, denotes injustice. A decent life exposes them to danger. Whoever sees it as a dream, I hope he will benefit from it: 1- The third appears

title: Interpretation of seeing urine in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of the appearance of urine according to Nabulsi: Seeing a person urinating in a dream on his clothes and they are distributed over the place, this is evidence of great financial wealth, but he will spend it on useless things. Also, seeing a person urinating on his clothes indicates that he is suffering from problems and worries. As for seeing the bed wet, it is a sign of getting rid of The worries and troubles that he is exposed to. Interpretation of a dream about urine for a single woman. Look at the girl. Unrelated. That the urine contained blood, and then she felt comfortable, as this indicates rejection of fatigue and problems. If a girl sees that she feels pain while urinating, this indicates that she will get into many problems. If she sees that He urinates but retains some of this urine, this indicates starting a new business and she will lose a lot of money. If she sees that she is urinating in a man’s bathroom and her urine is mixed with the urine of a young man, this indicates her marriage to that young man. Interpretation of a dream about urine for a married woman: for a married woman to see in a dream that she is urinating This indicates abundant and very good food. If this woman is in debt and sees urine in a dream, this indicates the repayment of the debt and the relief of distress. As for seeing urine trapped in a married woman’s dream, this is evidence of the abundance of goodness and the abundance of livelihood. If she dreams that her husband He urinates on her, this is good news that she is pregnant. Interpretation of a dream about urine for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman urinating in the toilet indicates major problems that will arise between her and her husband. Seeing urine in an unknown place is evidence of a lot of nourishment. Interpretation of the appearance of urine for a man. If a man sees in a dream, urinating, the dead person has a smell. Bad, this indicates that the dead person is asking for prayers and help. title: Interpretation of the dream of shaving the mustache in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of shaving the mustache in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, and the mustache is considered one of the things that pertains to the man, and since the man shaves it or takes care of it, and because it is one of the things that men care a lot about, and shaving is a matter of personal hygiene for men, while the dream of shaving the mustache in a dream carries Many different interpretations and explanations, as it is based on the dreamer’s aunt from all sides, that is, if he is single, married, or even a girl, or other interpretations around him. Interpretation of seeing a mustache shaving in a dream: Shaving the mustache is one of the personal hygiene issues for men, and when they see it in a dream, it has Different meanings and connotations. Which brings goodness and abundance, because it follows the teachings of our Holy Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace. The interpretation is as follows: Ibn Sirin’s statement about seeing a mustache in a dream means abundance of sustenance and kindness in reality, as dreaming of a mustache leads to the kindness and livelihood of the dreamer. The prominent researcher Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing a mustache interrupts all its connotations is a good thing, and that if The vision is to stay away from friends, they will be bad friends, which means they should stay away because they don't. You don't want it well. While it was said that a young man's complete shaving is an indication of his abandoning his honor and all the responsibilities required of him in the near future. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a car accident for a relative and its most important interpretations in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about shaving a mustache in a dream according to Imam Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi is considered one of Dream interpreters, and he has done his best to interpret many dreams, which are based on many details of the dream they had, as well as the social status of the dreamer, including seeing him shaving his mustache. In a dream, Al-Nabulsi confirmed the various meanings that their meanings are all good, and this is an example of our honorable Messenger Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace. Al-Nabulsi confirmed that the length of the mustache is one of the signs that express anxiety, sadness, and sorrow, and therefore whoever sees himself shaving his mustache in a dream is a sign that he will die from his anxiety. And his sadness. Likewise, if the dream is to cut off one’s mustache in a dream, then this is an indication of one’s distance from bad friends, as well as an indication of the abundance of money in the near future. But if his vision is admiring someone else’s mustache, then this is a sign of his jealousy of him and his competition with him to become better. From it. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a car accident and surviving it for unmarried and pregnant women. Interpretation of a dream about shaving a mustache for a single woman. As we know, when interpreting dreams, all the details related to the dream must be taken into account, as well as the dreamer’s social status, and since the interpretations of dreams for an unmarried girl differ from those for a married woman, this is because The various details of life between them, as well as the details that the dreamer says about the dream and that are related to the dream. As for the mustache for an unmarried girl, they are as follows: If seeing an unmarried girl shaving her mustache, this is evidence of someone trying to distort her reputation with lies by spreading false rumors about her and she must approach God Almighty, because

title: Interpretation of seeing a mouse in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a mouse in a dream is different for single, pregnant, and married women, as seeing a mouse has many interpretations and connotations. It can be evidence of the presence of an unfit woman or poverty, and sometimes it indicates goodness and abundance of food. We find that a mouse is one of the disturbing dreams for many, so in this article we will learn about the different interpretations of seeing a mouse. Interpretation of a dream about seeing happiness in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a mouse in a dream for a girl One: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is hitting a mouse hard on the head, this means that this girl is talking about a bad person. Also, when an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is talking to a mouse, this means that she will make friends with a new person soon. Interpretation of a dream Seeing gasoline in a dream - a symbol of fuel in a dream. Seeing a mouse in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream a mouse playing around her and she is not afraid of it, this indicates that some annoying things will happen in her life, but she will get rid of them quickly. Likewise, when a married woman sees In her dream that there is a small mouse and she hits it on the head, this means that she will get rid of the presence of an enemy of hers, and this enemy is weak. Interpretation of a dream about searching for a lost thing in a dream. Seeing a mouse in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that a mouse entered her house and took it out, then this It means that she is vulnerable to illness, but she will recover from it quickly. Also, when a pregnant woman sees in her dream that a mouse is eating her clothes, this means that she will be exposed to a financial crisis, but this crisis will end soon. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a short man in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a mouse in a dream for a divorced woman. A divorced woman saw in her dream that there was a large black rat, which means that she will face a big problem in her life. Likewise, when a divorced woman dreams of killing a rat and getting rid of it, this means that she has gotten rid of problems and crises in her life. If a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is getting a rat out of If one sees in his dream that he is hitting a mouse and killing it, this means that he will get rid of a financial crisis in his life. Likewise, when a person sees In his dream that there is a mouse trying to do this, but one of them does not get up and cannot do it, this means that he is going through a crisis and will get rid of it quickly. Interpretation of a dream about seeing flour in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a mouse in a dream for a young manIf a young man dreams that there is a mouse in his room and that young man tries Taking out a mouse, this means that there is a crisis in his life and he is trying to get rid of it. Also, when a young man dreams that he is killing a mouse, this indicates that he will get rid of a financial crisis in his life. Interpretation of seeing a mouse in its colors in a dreamWhen someone sees a mouse in black or gray in a dream This indicates that this is a warning to the dreamer that he has fallen into envy. Whereas if one sees in a dream that the mouse is red in color, this means that someone close to him will die. Also

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing ghee in a dream and its meanings

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing ghee in a dream In a dream, it undoubtedly includes many clear and important expressions and implications for dreamers, so in this article we will present the most important information about the interpretation of a dream about ghee in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing ghee in a dream, given that mistletoe contains many nutritional benefits. Seeing him in a dream can have many and varied indicators, and we will learn about it through the following lines: In general, obesity in a dream is considered evidence that the dreamer will increase his money and improve his situation. But if the dreamer sees his body fat in the dream, there is no doubt that this indicates On glory. It was also said that obesity in the body indicates jurisprudence and religion. Also, seeing butter in a dream means easy reaching the desired goal. As for eating butter in a dream, it symbolizes the presence of sufficient abilities in the dreamer to enable him to achieve the desired success. If the dreamer sees that He sells butter, this indicates that he will make profits and small gains. Or perhaps this vision refers to the normal lifespan of the dreamer, and God Almighty knows best. If the dreamer sees that he is hitting the mistletoe, this symbolizes achieving a close inheritance. In addition, a dream of mistletoe indicates a happy and pleasant surprise For its owner. While if obesity is a tourist in the body in a dream, this symbolizes the stumble of the dreamer. It is possible that the dreamer’s vision of obesity in a dream symbolizes the rise and increase of knowledge and knowledge about him. Also in the event that the dreamer sees that mistletoe is present in the food that He eats it. There is no doubt that this indicates his departure for travel and leisure travel, in a later period of his life. But if the dreamer sees that he is tasting a piece of fat, this indicates gratitude in some aspects of his life. If the dreamer sees himself eating or drinking ghee, this means that he will obtain an increase in money and livelihood. As for seeing cow’s ghee in a dream, there is no doubt It is one of the best types of ghee, and it is also better than seeing sheep ghee. In general, mistletoe in a dream indicates an increase in money and livelihood. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is fat in the body, this indicates that his livelihood will expand. In addition to the fact that ghee is in the dream It expresses knowledge that is useful to whoever sees it. It also refers to jurisprudence, positive hadiths, and the Qur’an to his people. If a sick person sees ghee in his dream, this indicates his recovery from his illness. Also, if one sees in his dream that he is eating fresh mistletoe, this is a symbol of the success of visionary plans. While whoever eats fresh or not good ghee, this indicates that his future plans will fail. Interpretation of the dream of seeing ghee. title: Interpretation of a dream about a famous vision by Ibn Sirin and the great translators

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a famous person: Seeing a famous person in a dream carries several different indicators mentioned by interpretation scholars in their books. There will be tremendous food for him in the real world, as jurists have explained another set of interpretations that vary according to the signs present in the dream and the condition of the dreamer, and in the following lines we have collected all the relevant information in the dream of seeing a famous person in a dream... So follow the interpretations of the dream of seeing a famous person. A famous person in a dream is one of the good visions that symbolizes a group of positive things that will happen to the dreamer in reality. In the event that the dreamer sees a famous person wearing black clothes, this means that the dreamer will gain a high status among the people and will be greatly respected and appreciated by them. When the person sees That there is a famous person in a dream wearing green clothes, this means that the dreamer will receive a lot of sustenance and allowances and will receive a lot of gains in his life which will make him very happy and happy. Seeing celebrities laughing in a dream is considered good news on its way to the dreamer and that he will be very happy. It will be the beginning of many good things that will happen in the dreamer’s life. If one sees a famous person with a sullen face in a dream and feels very angry, this means that there are some unpleasant things that will happen to the pioneer and that he will suffer a lot in the coming period from some things that bother him and make him Feeling tired. Still can't find an interpretation of your dream? Go to Google and search for the Secrets of Dream Interpretation website. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a famous person by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin told us that seeing a famous person has many benefits for the fortuneteller, especially if this person has a beautiful body and elegant clothes. Seeing a famous cleric in a dream is a good thing. Which translates to a person who loves doing good deeds and is always ready for people to get their rights and help those around them in solving problems and has a sweet tongue that is always fragrant with the remembrance of God. Seeing a famous person entering the dreamer’s house and eating with him inside the house means that the dreamer will come to him with a new job that will make him earn more money. Money and this will make his life better for the better. And his children. The great scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a famous person in a dream symbolizes success and distinction in life and that the dreamer will receive many different blessings and gains. If the dreamer sees his wife, the king, or the head of state smiling in a dream, this means that the dreamer will get rid of problems and fears. Which he is facing in the recent period. Interpretation of a famous dream for an unmarried woman. Seeing a famous artist in an unmarried woman’s dream is considered one of the new things that predicts the emergence of many pleasant and promising things for the dreamer. If an unmarried woman saw in a dream a famous person, and she was sitting with him and laughing, then this It means that she will hear good and happy news in the coming period. If the dreamer sees himself shaking hands with one of the leaders or senior heads of state, this means that the dreamer will reach a high position in reality and she will obtain a prominent position with help.
